talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Oh. You discovered the shrine already?
Before I imparted my words of guidance?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Well. That makes me feel rather
superfluous.<sp:0:4:0>I should have spoken up sooner.
Apologies.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>The task I was given is complete thanks
to you.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Now I will watch over the sacred shrine.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Welcome back to the land of the sacred
shrine.<sp:5:0:0> I am glad to have you here again.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome.<sp:5:0:0> You have tread upon the land
of a sacred shrine. I am the keeper of
said shrine.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice>My task is complete thanks to you.


Now I will watch over the sacred shrine.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>This shrine is mine to oversee whether in
the sky or on the surface. As is the land
where it resides.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Your skill is impressive.<sp:5:0:0> Have you
considered taking part in the
<clr:0000>dive ceremony<clr:ffff>?
You should participate if you have not
done so.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease>The dive ceremony is a test of bravery
that young Zonai must pass in order to be
considered adults.
You can earn a <clr:0000>special outfit <clr:ffff>as proof of
your maturity by clearing the trial.

But this island is not where it takes place.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Oh... You have already gone to all three
sky islands and completed the ceremony?

I should have guessed as much...<sp:5:0:0>
Your talent is plain as day.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>My task is to guide visitors here to the
sacred shrine by conveying this message:

<sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:0000>"Dye the white pattern black when the
sun awakens in the sky. Then will the
sacred shrine appear."<clr:ffff>
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The dive ceremony is held on three
sky islands.

One <clr:0000>north of Central Hyrule Sky<clr:ffff>...


another <clr:0000>west of Central Hyrule Sky<clr:ffff>...


and a third <clr:0000>south of Lanayru Sky<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>I have no doubt you will be able to pass
the trials on all three islands and thereby
obtain the outfit.
Please do so when you have time.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>The shrine will appear when you unlock
the true meaning of these words.
